tool.name: dada2: removeBimeraDenovo
tool.description: Remove bimeras from collections of unique sequences

configfiles.configfile:
library(dada2, quietly=T)
unqs <- readRDS('$unqs') st <- removeBimeraDenovo(unqs, method = "$method") saveRDS(st, file='$stable')
print( paste( "remaining nonchimeric: ", 100*sum(st)/sum(unqs), "%" )) ##write.table(st, "$stable", quote=F, sep="\t")

param.name: method
param.label: Method
param.option: check samples independently for bimeras and make a consensus decision on each sequence variant
check samples independently for bimeras and remove (0-out) sequence variants from samples independently
